snippet.title: Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 33: Fantasy Zone Complete Collection (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
This game is a compilation containing every game released in the Fantasy Zone series, plus several "new" ones. The main attraction is the new System 16 version of Fantasy Zone II, a newly-made 16-bit re-imagining of the original Master System game, actually programmed for the original System 16 hardware (via emulation). This reworking is a rather loose interpretation of the original game, billed as a "concept remake," culling elements of Fantasy Zone 1 and 2 and blending them with original elements to answer the question "What if Fantasy Zone II was developed for the arcade by the original AM team instead of for the Sega Master System by the R&D team."
Also included is Fantasy Zone Neo Classic which is an updated port of the Famicom version of Fantasy Zone, and Fantasy Zone II DX - a remastered version of Fantasy Zone II to look and feel as if it were running on Sega System 16 hardware.
